title: Completion Based Copy Testing
description: Run a multi-channel campaign (social teasers, creator partnerships, campus/community outreach, PR, and email) with clear conversion funnels to RSVPs. Expect a launch kit—messaging, assets, ad sets, landing copy—and weekly performance reports optimizing toward CPA, attendance rate, and post-event engagement.

milestones.title: Phase 1: Asset Development
milestones.description: Define messaging pillars, and create the launch kit

milestones.title: Phase 2: Activation
milestones.description: Activate partnerships with creators, schools, and local groups; and drive RSVP conversions through ad sets and organic buzz.

milestones.title: Phase 3: Reporting
milestones.description: Deliver a post-event performance report with key metrics, learnings, and recommendations.
